sense.name: converge, configure or align (physically or figuratively)
sense.commentary: Syntax Includes: NP1 FOCUS NP2 NP1[topic[inanimate]] FOCUS PP NP1[material[abstract]] FOCUS INTO NP2[product]
sense.examples: Her eyes focused on the painting across the room. Their common experience has focused into a sense of shared destiny. Suddenly the blurred faces focused into a sharp picture. The shoreline focused the wave into a towering wall of water.

sense.name: concentrate, direct attention towards
sense.commentary: Syntax Is: NP1[agent[animate]] FOCUS PP Note: NP1 may be an individual or an organization.
sense.examples: Her mind focused on the painting across the room. A lot of anger and attention were focused on the town's new leash law. Stay focused during your performance. The museum is focusing on their Pre-Colombian collection.
